title: need ride to san antonio for thanksgiving (mcallen)
shortDescription:
two 20somethings looking for a ride from 
the valley to san antonio on the 22nd of november to visit family. send message if you can do this for us!

title: need ride to san antonio 10/11 (mission/mcallen)
shortDescription:
hi i'm visiting home (the valley) for a few days next week. 
my ride needs to leave a day earlier than i do though. 
i'm looking for anyone travelling to or through san antonio, i can help chip in money for gas. 
i travel light and am respectful and  [...]
